"Xiera": "Here on Planet Earth, the city of Las Vegas is a unique city with a collection of various buildings and monuments that are found all over the globe."
"There have been reports of gigantic unidentified flying objects appearing in the skies, and appear to be related to the Phantom-species of Earth."
"To help investigate these reports, we ARKS have developed the \"Rideroid\" as a way to soar and defend the skies from these U.F.Os. Please use them at your leisure."
